metadata.description: You've seen the hit TV series...you've read the comics...but now the world of Super Hero Squad comes to life in the Super Hero Squad Online video game! So what better way to celebrate than a comic book special featuring everyone's favorite Squaddies?!? That's right -- it's a comic book based on a video game based on a TV show based on comic books! The circle is complete! Hero up and join the fun!
metadata.name: Marvel Super Hero Squad Online Game: Hero Up!
